data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Kars who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kars, Turkey
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kars, Turkey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 52 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kars, Turkey.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Kars to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Kars, Turkey.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Deaf people. Make the Deaf people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Over 99.4 percent of the people of Kars are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Kars, Turkey, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: God, guide the 113 believers in Kars to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

location.name: Kars
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Lebanese, Jew, Spanish, Abkhaz, Hemshin, Herki
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Lebanese (100,000), Jew, Spanish (16,000), Abkhaz (164,000), Hemshin (22,000), Herki (43,000)
